tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
First of all i would like to thank Dr.sarbari Gupta for guiding us in the right direction regarding my son's health issue. He has been having persitant coug and cold and at night he couldn't sleep properly because of cold. After trying out various medications like nebulization and steaming nothing seems to work. The cold seems to go away but starts again during the night especially in cold season. So I was referred to this dr through my neighbour and she immediately suggested seeing an ENT specialist for this as his problem is only in the nose and not lungs. She said we can give temporary medicines which will solve the issue temporally but the real solution is with ENT specialist who can address it more clearly. For us luckily we went to Caveliar hospital Dr.Srinivasa and he gave the right medicine and now my son is completely fine.he asked to come after a month for review. Now my son's cold has come down.

So I strongly recommend the above dr. She is not only friendly but gives good guidance.

tags: None
review: The doctor patiently heard the problem, and had followup queries to understand it better. She did not jump to medications, and rather focused on healthy eating habits, focus on nutrition etc. Finally the medicines recommended was for SoS basis only. Overall a pleasant experience.

tags: None
review:
To me and my baby.. Dr. Gupta has been a blessing...  My 8months old baby was suffering from cough...  Without any cold..  We consulted a different doctor earlier but the treatment was not effective...  Earlier doctor was treating it as common cold...  And prescribed all common cold related medicine..  It was two months and no. change.. 

Then we consulted Dr Gupta...  She cleared it that it was allergic cough and not common cold..  She prescribed the medicine... And in a week my baby was perfectly fine...  

Dr. Gupta is just a blessing for me...  

Thank you so much Dr. Gupta...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: If you want to consult a very good paediatrician in Bangalore, **** *** ******* ** *** ***** I have consulted 4-5 doctors around 2016 when we moved to Bangalore and one day luckily we consulted her at Ovum. Ever since, we decided that she will be our paediatrician of choice. She is sensitive and friendly to both parents and children and puts them at ease. She takes great care and goes out of her way to ensure proper medical support. *** ********* *** ********* ** ********** And she explains the situation to parents so that we know exactly what happened. When my daughter was admitted for gastroenteritis, she visited the IPD and spent time checking her and explaining the situation to us. *** **** *** ***** *********** ***** ** ***** *** **** ********** She assesses the patient giving enough time to reach family and then prescribes treatment. A true gem of a doctor.

review:
The services that we received from the hospital is excellent. Dr. Sarbari Gupta and the staff are friendly and ensure that we are properly informed about our baby's health and care. I would have no qualms in recommending them to relatives and friends. Dr. Sarbari Gupta was a wonderful pediatrician, she has not only taken great care of our baby's health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It's rare to find a doctor that combines such person touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I would like to thank the hospital management as well for warm and  welcoming environment, friendly and helpful staff. Fantastic service delivered by all.

Thank you
Ramya .A

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Although I had a very bitter experience with ovum gynecologist i had decided not to get back to OVUM again. After getting repeated good reviews from friends and neighbours about the pediatric section with a paranoid though I went to the hospital. I met Dr Gupta and was impressed by her way of explaining everything, her friendly nature and the way she handled the baby was quite impressive. She is no way a doctor who is on her toes to give medicines. This is very important when we deal with infants. Thank u Dr. I recommend ovum for pediatrics but never ever for gynec.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went to the doctor for vaccination for my 8 month old. While she mentioned that the vaccination was not due until the end of the 9th month, she administered a flu shot which is completely optional. She didn't seek my consent. Also these injections are very expensive. **** *** ****** ********** *** **** ***** post the injection she could not identify where it was given to put on the band aid. Overall i didn't walk out of the hospital feeling very good about the experience and my baby was very uncomfortable ***** *** **** * which is not the case usually. 
Also the hospital (Ovum) didn't do a good job of  his height, weight and head circumference. The attending nurse took less than a minute to finish everything. A week later when i measured him at our regular pediatrician , the measurements are all different, for example: the height cannot reduce by a few cms in 1 week.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
The doctor was good. Reception staff are very rude and not helpful at all. They didn't inform us about the cost and made us do a nebulization for our child at the hospital. We bought the mask and the medicine and they still charged us for it. Which they should have informed. We could have done it at home. 
Over all i feel it's a cash making place. I personally would not recommend it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Sarbari for more than 2 years now. She is very caring, doesn't rush and listens carefully to us and our daughter. She explains without intimidating and has always provided a treatment which has helped. She also doesn't prescribe too many medicines unless needed. My daughter is comfortable around her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sarbari makes her patients feel at ease. She listens to all the symptoms, does a proper examination and prescribes medicines starting from the simplest.
